name: Virus Sandbox
description:
You are the mayor of a town struck by a COVID-19 outbreak.

Your goal is to get past the pandemic with a minimum of deaths.

Play cards to take action. Examples:

More card decks get unsealed as the pandemic progresses.

Keep an eye on your resources (pasta, toilet paper and masks) as well as on the mood of your citizens: If they panic, they start to stockpile, if they get angry, they protest, or even start looting and rioting.

It's up to you to guess which measure will have which effect - that's part of the challenge.

Hint: As long as the fear level is down at "careless" (butterfly), people won't support strict measures. So you might want to be careful with unpopular measures like lock-downs or the tracking app.
